code:
sequenceDiagram
  %% Authored stress fixture (Mermaid@11.12.2): loop with nested opt + alt and mixed arrows.

  participant U as User
  participant A as API
  participant DB as Database

  loop poll every minute
    U->>A: GET /items
    activate A
    opt cache miss
      A->>DB: query
      DB-->>A: rows
    end
    alt ok
      A-->>U: 200
    else error
      A--xU: 500
      Note right of U: try later
    end
    deactivate A
  end
